pages.text: Frost Shards are a very rare drop fom Snowmans from the $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/horde)Cold Snap Horde$(). It can be used to craft Frost Cores and the Top Hat. The Top Hat will make the Cold Snap Horde think that you're a part of them. But you have to put it on while they don't see you.
